description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Build Miner Sandbox style worlds, then traverse them in interesting and fun ways. Fly, Drive, Walk or use Spider powers to cling to walls, then spider shot to another. Explore computer generated worlds to find hidden blocks, some hidden blocks have special properties. Some of these properties include starting or stopping a timer, another lets you bounce up and down, what will the others do?
